TERMS & CONDITIONS:

PRICESOur quoted prices are FIRM & on Ex-works Kolkata basis .

PAYMENT100% Payment with full Taxes & Duties to be made to us through Local L/C. with 45 Days usance Period from the date of dispatch . All L/C opening charges shall be to your account.


WARRANTYThe warranty period for our materials shall be 18 months from the date of supply or 12  months from the date of use in the line whichever is earlier.
